solution_line_template: She has {num_students} students and her muffin recipe only makes {muffins_per_batch} muffins so she needs to bake {num_students}/{muffins_per_batch} = <<{num_students}/{muffins_per_batch}={batches_per_month}>>{batches_per_month} batches of muffins

She brings muffins on the 1st of the month for {num_months} months and it takes {batches_per_month} batches to feed all of her students so she bakes {num_months}*{batches_per_month} = {total_batches} batches of muffins
